item.title: Log-Structured Merge Tree
item.description: An LSM Tree overview and Java implementation

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I am Francesco. I am an Italian Software Engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for solving complex problems. I am interested in a range of topics, including distributed systems, databases, compression techniques, and machine learning. Feel free to have a look at my Github, Medium, or get in touch on Linkedin.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Education University of Milan Master of Science in Computer Science 2020 - 2022 University of Trento Bachelor of Science in Computer Science 2017 - 2020 Work Experience Software Engineer Satispay, Milan, Italy Jan 2023 - Present Software Engineer Intern Spaziodati, Trento, Italy Feb 2020 - Jun 2020 Skills Programming Languages Java, Python, C++ Technologies PostgreSQL, AWS, Spring, Docker, Spark, Git, Linux Topics Distributed systems, Databases, Microservices, Data compression , Machine learning, Testing, CI/CD
